Title: The Saint
Writer: Leslie Charteris (character), Jonathan Hensleigh (story), Jonathan Hensleigh (screenplay), Wesley Strick (screenplay)
Actors: Val Kilmer, Elisabeth Shue, Rade Serbedzija, Valeriy Nikolaev
Plot: Simon Templar (The Saint), is a thief for hire, whose latest job to steal the secret process for cold fusion puts him at odds with a traitor bent on toppling the Russian government, as well as the woman who holds its secret.
